short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically widens instructure Canvas file pages to fit slides properly

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A simple extension to automatically resize canvas file windows so that they stop cutting off the right edge of slides. The new size can be easily set in the options to any normal CSS length, the default is shown in the screenshot. Note that the right of the screenshot on here is cropped to fit, there's a bit of white space cut out on the right.

Source: https://github.com/ConnorPietrasik/canvas-widener/tree/master
